settings.integratedEditorHint: Open page editor inside the journal screen instead of opening of a separate page editor.
settings.editorEngineHint: Which editor engine to use in the integrated editor.
settings.createDefaultPageHint: After creating a new journal, add a page with the same name in it.
settings.createSilentPageHint: When a page is created, skip opening the edit dialog.
settings.pinIconsHint: When creating a Pin by dragging a page from a Journal on the canvas, use the content type icon (see the icons used for the button panel) for the pin rather than the default one.
settings.uploadFolderHint: Path to folder for uploading pasted images.
settings.pasteToPageImageHint: When pasting images in Journals, paste them in an "Image Page" instead of a "Text Page".

notifications.warnPastePermission: Failed to parse clipboard. Make sure your browser supports the navigator API. Check the module documentation for how to enable it.
